data.prayer: Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the state of Shamal Sina'.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shamal Sina‘, Egypt
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Shamal Sina‘, Egypt know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 22 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 13,980 believers in Shamal Sina' to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Shamal Sina‘, Egypt. Please, stir the 13,980 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Baharia, Wahati people.
Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Shamal Sina'.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Shamal Sina'.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.section_summary:
the state of Shamal Sina‘, Egypt has a population of 314,300.

We estimate Shamal Sina' has 13,980 people who might know Jesus, 27,286 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 273,033 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 22 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 314,300 souls living in the state of Shamal Sina' with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

location.name: Shamal Sina'
location.cities_list: Arish, Bir Hadaj, Mitzpe Ramon, Midreshet Ben-Gurion, Revivim
location.cities_list_w_pop: Arish (128,855), Bir Hadaj (5,735), Mitzpe Ramon (5,211), Midreshet Ben-Gurion (1,972), Revivim (1,075)
